en.title: FE Making Waves in Canada!
en.content:
FE recently exhibited at the CAN-FIT-PRO Fitness Trade Show, Toronto Metro Convention Centre, Canada.

It was a BIG SUCCESS and many pendants were sold! Participants were lifting weights and trying out various exercise machines at the tradeshow. After they stopped by our booth, they were astonished! They took some of the ENERGY WATER, went off and lifted heavier weights and did faster and better on the exercise machines!

As a result, even exhibitors from other booths dropped by and bought more pendants!!! Many were speculating it might be placebo effect or mind-over-matter... but after several tests (one even did blind-fold test) all admit Scalar Energy is no mind-over-matter !!!

Check out the video !!! [Click Here]

Thank You Annie, Zach (FE'S Canadian Country Licensee) and their team for a Great Job Done!
